subtitleNullable: A cleaned version of the FER(2013) dataset with additional images we added.
descriptionNullable:
## About the Dataset

This dataset was created by a team of students for our research projects.  Special thanks to Simran, Manav Shah, Saurabh Hulyal, Nishant, Agrja Rastogi, and Kaustav Sarkar. We trained an emotion classification model with it, which was a part of our project.


### Categories

The dataset has 3 categories namely Neutral, Interested, and Disappointed. Images under the folder belong to that category.


### Acknowledgements

Massive thanks to the FER-2013 dataset as most of the images are from there. We cleaned the dataset and used it along with hand annotating images Manav and Simran scraped. 


### Inspiration

We trained our first model on the FER-2013 dataset and many of the images were mislabeled. This limited the accuracy we could achieve. To counter this we decided to make our own version of the dataset.
title: Facial-Expression-Classification-Dataset(3Classes)
subtitle: A cleaned version of the FER(2013) dataset with additional images we added.
description:
## About the Dataset

This dataset was created by a team of students for our research projects.  Special thanks to Simran, Manav Shah, Saurabh Hulyal, Nishant, Agrja Rastogi, and Kaustav Sarkar. We trained an emotion classification model with it, which was a part of our project.


### Categories

The dataset has 3 categories namely Neutral, Interested, and Disappointed. Images under the folder belong to that category.


### Acknowledgements

Massive thanks to the FER-2013 dataset as most of the images are from there. We cleaned the dataset and used it along with hand annotating images Manav and Simran scraped. 


### Inspiration

We trained our first model on the FER-2013 dataset and many of the images were mislabeled. This limited the accuracy we could achieve. To counter this we decided to make our own version of the dataset.
